price: "O narode moj", reče on, "zar rodbina moja kod vas ima veći ugled od Allaha, a Njega ste iza sebe odbacili?! Uistinu, Gospodar moj ono što radite znanjem obuhvata.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَهۡطِيٓ أَعَزُّ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُ وَرَآءَكُمۡ ظِهۡرِيًّاۖ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi arahṭī aʿazzu ʿalaykum mina al-lahi wa-ittakhadhtumūhu warāakum ẓih'riyyan inna rabbī bimā taʿmalūna muḥīṭun
